quotes.tt: I WOULD TRAVEL DOWN TO HELL AND WRESTLE A FILM AWAY FROM THE DEVIL IF IT WAS NECESSARY.
WHEN PEOPLE ASK ME IF I WENT TO FILM SCHOOL I TELL THEM, 'NO, I WENT TO FILMS'.
WE DON'T MAKE MOVIES TO MAKE MORE MONEY. WE MAKE MONEY TO MAKE MORE MOVIES.
THE MOST HONEST FORM OF FILMMAKING IS TO MAKE A FILM FOR YOURSELF.

TO BE A FILMMAKER, YOU HAVE TO LEAD. YOU HAVE TO BE PSYCHOTIC IN YOUR DESIRE TO DO SOMETHING. PEOPLE ALWAYS LIKE THE EASY ROUTE. YOU HAVE TO PUSH VERY HARD TO GET SOMETHING UNUSUAL, SOMETHING DIFFERENT.
I DON'T DREAM AT NIGHT, I DREAM AT DAY, I DREAM ALL DAY; I'M DREAMING FOR A LIVING.
IF IT'S A GOOD MOVIE, THE SOUND COULD GO OFF AND THE AUDIENCE WOULD STILL HAVE A PRETTY CLEAR IDEA OF WHAT WAS GOING ON.
EVERY TIME I GO TO A MOVIE, IT'S MAGIC, NO MATTER WHAT THE MOVIE'S ABOUT.
ALMOST ANYTHING CAN BE JUSTIFIED AS A STYLE OF FILMMAKING IF IT WORKS.
THE ENEMY OF ART IS THE ABSENCE OF LIMITATIONS.
SELF-PLAGIARISM IS STYLE.
BEING AN ARTIST MEANS NOT HAVING TO AVERT ONE'S EYES.
THE MORE SUCCESSFUL THE VILLAIN, THE MORE SUCCESSFUL THE PICTURE.
FILMMAKING IS JUST A VERY LUXURIOUS AND EFFICIENT WAY OF EXPRESSING YOURSELF.
A DIRECTOR MUST BE A POLICEMAN, A MIDWIFE, A PSYCHOANALYST, A SYCOPHANT AND A BASTARD.

PICK UP A CAMERA. SHOOT SOMETHING. NO MATTER HOW SMALL, NO MATTER HOW CHEESY, NO MATTER WHETHER YOUR FRIENDS AND YOUR SISTER STAR IN IT. PUT YOUR NAME ON IT AS DIRECTOR. NOW YOU'RE A DIRECTOR. EVERYTHING AFTER THAT YOU'RE JUST NEGOTIATING YOUR BUDGET AND YOUR FEE.
BUT HAVING A REALLY GOOD UNDERSTANDING OF HISTORY, LITERATURE, PSYCHOLOGY, SCIENCES - IS VERY, VERY IMPORTANT TO ACTUALLY BEING ABLE TO MAKE MOVIES.
I STEAL FROM EVERY MOVIE EVER MADE.
GIVE THEM PLEASURE - THE SAME PLEASURE THEY HAVE WHEN THEY WAKE UP FROM A NIGHTMARE.
FILMMAKING IS A CHANCE TO LIVE MANY LIFETIMES.
